comment: She needs to eat a cheeseburger and she will be fine. If she is so stressed with modeling, maybe this isn't for her. I swear I need to have a Dear Jan column, some people have no common sense.
amr:
# ::snt She needs to eat a cheeseburger and she will be fine. If she is so stressed with modeling, maybe this isn't for her. I swear I need to have a Dear Jan column, some people have no common sense.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (a / and
            :op1 (n / need-01
                  :ARG0 (s / she)
                  :ARG1 (e / eat-01
                        :ARG0 s
                        :ARG1 (c / cheeseburger)))
            :op2 (f / fine-04
                  :ARG1 s))
      :snt2 (p / possible-01
            :ARG1 (h / have-polarity-91
                  :ARG1 (t / this)
                  :ARG2 -
                  :beneficiary (s2 / she))
            :condition (s3 / stress-02
                  :ARG0 (m2 / model-01
                        :ARG0 s2)
                  :ARG1 s2
                  :degree (s4 / so)))
      :snt3 (s5 / swear-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (n2 / need-01
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (c2 / column
                        :mod (p2 / person
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Dear"
                                    :op2 "Jan")))))
      :snt4 (s6 / sense-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (p3 / person
                  :mod (s7 / some))
            :mod (c3 / common)))
